item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Yeckar Yeckar
item.description:
@Yeckar wrote:

In prayerhandler.java, search for gfxrich. Find the start and end (public void is start, } is end) and that with

public void redemption(int p) {
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
	if(c.playerLevel[3] <= c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])/10 && c.playerLevel[3] > 0 && c.redempt) {
		c.playerLevel[3] += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])/4;
		c.playerLevel[5] = 0;
		c.headIcon = 0;
		c.refreshSkills();
		resetPrayer(p);
		c.gfxRich(436);
	}

If that doesnt’ work, Iunno.
(psst, the guy above me prolly knows more than me, do his idea first)

Read full topic
